About us

View more

At Azumi Filtration Product Co Ltd (Japan) we specialize in Automotive filtration products with a wide range of products covering most passenger vehicle applications around the world. Azumi corporation is a renowned name in the industry as a producer of premium quality filtration products. We have started out as a domestic Japanese supplier but have over the last years extended to various countries in the Asian, South American Africa regions.
